languages.text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Мастер-тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3. Затем он и все его союзники, у которых в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области. До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика все союзники, которые атаковали под действием Последнего рывка, получают штраф −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} мастера-тактика уменьшается на 40 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All allies, including the Tactician, that have Line of Sight to any of the enemies inside seleted zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within that zone they can target with their weapons. Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of the Last Volley suffer a -20 penalty to their Ballistic Skill and Weapons Skill, while the Tactician's Fellowship is reduced by -40 until the end of combat.

The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All allies, including the Tactician, that have Line of Sight to any of the enemies inside seleted zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within that zone they can target with their weapons. Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of the Last Volley suffer a -20 penalty to their Ballistic Skill and Weapons Skill, while the Tactician's Fellowship is reduced by -40 until the end of combat.

The Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All allies, including the Tactician, that have a line of sight to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy they can target with their weapons within this zone. Until the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of the Last Volley suffer a -20 penalty to their Ballistic skill and Weapon skill, while the Tactician's Fellowship is reduced by -40 until the end of combat.

The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of Last Volley suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

languages.text:
Мастер-тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3.
Затем он и все его союзники, у которых в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.
До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика все союзники, которые атаковали под действием {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Последнего рывка{/g}, получают штраф −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} мастера-тактика уменьшается на 40 до конца боя.

Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text:
Мастер-тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3.
Затем он и все его союзники, у которых в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g} есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области.
До начала следующего хода мастера-тактика все союзники, которые атаковали под действием {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Последнего рывка{/g}, получают штраф −20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} мастера-тактика уменьшается на 40 до конца боя.

Тактик размечает на поле боя область 3×3. Тактик и все его союзники, у которых в зоне видимости есть кто-либо из противников в этой области, немедленно совершают по одиночной атаке, которую позволяет оружие, против случайного противника в этой области. До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика все союзники, которые атаковали под действием Последнего рывка, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 к Дальнему Бою и Ближнему Бою. Общительность тактика уменьшается на −40 до конца боя.

languages.text:
战术专家在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。
包括战术专家在内的所有盟友，只要是{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内有该片区域内的敌人，就可以立刻对该片区域内的随机一名敌人进行一次单体攻击。
所有参与{g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}最终齐射{/g}的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会降低20点，效果持续至战术专家的下个回合开始为止。战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低40点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。 此后包括战术专家在内的所有盟友，只要是{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内有该片区域内的敌人，就可以立刻对该片区域内的随机一名敌人进行一次单体攻击。 所有参与最终齐射的盟友，弹道技能与武器技能都会获得-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低-40，效果持续至战斗结束。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}在战场上选择一片3×3的区域。 包括战术专家在内的所有盟友，只要是{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内有该片区域内的敌人，就可以立刻对该片区域内的随机一名敌人进行一次单体攻击。 所有参与最终齐射的盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会降低20点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}，效果持续至战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。战术专家的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低40点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
El maestro táctico designa una zona de 3×3 en el campo de batalla.
Todos los aliados (incluido el maestro táctico) que puedan trazar {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} hasta cualquier enemigo situado dentro de la zona designada efectúan inmediatamente un único ataque contra un enemigo aleatorio de esta zona que sea un objetivo válido para sus armas.
Hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del maestro táctico, todos los aliados que hayan atacado como parte de {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Salva final{/g} sufren una penalización de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, mientras que la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del maestro táctico se reduce en −40 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} designa una zona de 3×3 en el campo de batalla. Todos los aliados (incluido el maestro táctico) que puedan trazar {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} hasta cualquier enemigo situado dentro de la zona designada efectúan inmediatamente un único ataque contra un enemigo aleatorio de esta zona que sea un objetivo válido para sus armas. Hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, todos los aliados que hayan atacado como parte de Salva final sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill} Habilidad de armas{/g}, mientras que la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del maestro táctico se reduce en −40 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text:
Der Meistertaktiker wählt auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone von 3×3 Feldern aus.
Alle Verbündeten, inklusive des Meistertaktikers, die eine direkte {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Feinden innerhalb der ausgewählten Zone haben, führen sofort einen Einzelangriff auf einen zufälligen Feind in dieser Zone aus, den sie mit ihren Waffen erreichen können.
Bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Meistertaktikers gilt, dass alle Verbündeten, die als Teil von {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Letzte Salve{/g} angegriffen haben, einen Abzug von −20 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} erleiden, und die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} des Meistertaktikers wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −40 reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} wählt auf dem Schlachtfeld eine Zone von 3×3 Feldern aus. Alle Verbündeten, inklusive des Meistertaktikers, die eine direkte {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} zu Feinden innerhalb der ausgewählten Zone haben, führen sofort einen Einzelangriff auf einen zufälligen Feind aus, den sie mit ihren Waffen in dieser Zone erreichen können. Bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers gilt, dass alle Verbündeten, die als Teil von Letzte Salve angegriffen haben, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} erleiden, während die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} des Meistertaktikers bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −40 reduziert wird.

languages.text:
Le Maître tacticien sélectionne une zone de 3 × 3 cases sur le champ de bataille.
Tous les alliés, y compris le maître tacticien, qui ont en {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} des ennemis situés dans la zone sélectionnée lancent une attaque ponctuelle immédiate contre un ennemi aléatoire de cette zone qu'ils peuvent cibler avec leurs armes.
Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, une pénalité de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de tous les alliés qui ont attaqué dans le cadre de {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Dernière Salve{/g}. Une réduction de −40 s'applique également à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} du maître tacticien jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Le Maître tacticien sélectionne une zone de 3 × 3 cases sur le champ de bataille. Tous les alliés, y compris le maître tacticien, qui ont en {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} des ennemis situés dans la zone sélectionnée lancent une attaque ponctuelle immédiate contre un ennemi aléatoire de cette zone qu'ils peuvent cibler avec leurs armes. Jusqu'au début du tour suivant du maître tacticien, une pénalité de −20 s'applique à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} de tous les alliés qui ont attaqué dans le cadre de Dernière Salve. Une réduction de −40 s'applique également à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} du maître tacticien jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 戦略の達人が戦場の3×3の範囲を選ぶ。 選択した範囲内にいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいる、戦略の達人を含むすべての味方は、その範囲内にいる、自身の武器でターゲットにできるランダムな敵1体に対して、即座に単体攻撃を行う。 戦略の達人の次のターン開始まで、最後の斉射の一員として攻撃したすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}に−20のペナルティを受ける。また、戦闘終了まで戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}が−40される。
languages.original_text: The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield. All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons. Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of Last Volley suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦略の達人が戦場の3×3の範囲を選ぶ。 選択した範囲内にいる敵が{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}にいる、戦略の達人を含むすべての味方は、その範囲内にいる、自身の武器でターゲットにできるランダムな敵1体に対して、即座に単体攻撃を行う。 戦略の達人の次のターン開始まで、最後の斉射の一員として攻撃したすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}に−20のペナルティを受ける。また、戦闘終了まで戦略の達人の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}が−40される。

languages.text:
Usta Taktisyen, çatışma alanında 3×3'lük bir bölge seçer.
Seçilen bölge içindeki herhangi bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattına{/g} alan tüm dost birimler (Usta Taktisyen de dâhil), bu bölge içinde bulunan ve silahlarıyla hedefleyebilecekleri rastgele bir düşmana anında tek saldırı gerçekleştirir.
{g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Son Salvo{/g} kabiliyetinin parçası olarak saldıran tüm dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliklerine −20 ceza puanı alırken (etkisi Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki turunun başına dek sürer) Usta Taktisyen'in {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği de 40 puan azalır (etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer).
languages.original_text:
The Master Tactician selects a 3×3 zone on the battlefield.
All allies, including the Master Tactician, that have a {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} to any enemies inside the selected zone make an immediate single attack against a random enemy within this zone that they can target with their weapons.
Until the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, all allies that attacked as part of {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} suffer a −20 penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, while the Master Tactician's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} is reduced by −40 until the end of combat.
